attributes.action: Attempt to set up a data base of everyones DNA in the UK, start taking it at births
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To completely cut down on the time taken to catch rapist and other criminals that may leave DNA I suggest taking everybodies DNA. The innocent have nothing to hide. This should be done on the premise that a law is brought in that DNA is only used in criminal cases and not perternity tests.
